translations: 达克斯猎狗（一种短腿长身的德国种猎犬）

sentences.sentence: He wanted to draw a picture of it, but he wasn't sure how to spell "dachshund", so he simply wrote "Hot Dog".
sentences.translation: 他想给它画一张图，但是他不知道如何拼写 “dachshund”，所以他就简单地写了 “Hot Dog”。

sentences.sentence: "Dachshund" is a German small long thin dog.
sentences.translation: 腊肠犬是德国的一种又小又瘦的狗。

sentences.sentence: Tad Dorgan, saw the red hot dachshund sausages sold on streets.
sentences.translation: 塔德·多尔根看到了大街上卖的滚烫发红的“腊肠狗”香肠。
